meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a hick
meanings.sent1: The man's hickish attire stood out in the city crowd.
meanings.sent2: Her hickish accent revealed her rural upbringing.
meanings.sent3: The hickish hat clashed with his sleek suit.
meanings.sent4: The old truck had a hickish charm that reminded me of simpler times.
meanings.sent5: The smell of hay and horses made the barn feel hickish.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a manner typical of a hick
meanings.sent1: Their hickish behavior at the fancy restaurant drew stares.
meanings.sent2: He felt hickish as he struggled to use the chopsticks.
meanings.sent3: The city slickers found his hickish jokes endearing.
meanings.sent4: She tried to hide her hickish tendencies in front of her new friends.
meanings.sent5: The hickish dance moves made everyone smile at the party.
